trans-unit.source: Represents the context for the trust manager to consider when making the decision to run an application, and when setting up the security on a new <xref href="System.AppDomain"></xref> in which to run an application.
trans-unit.target: Representerer konteksten for klarering manager å vurdere når du gjør avgjørelsen om å kjøre et program og under konfigurasjon av sikkerhet på en ny <xref href="System.AppDomain"> </xref> skal kjøre en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the TrustManagerContext class, see the <xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.%23ctor> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av klassen TrustManagerContext, kan du se den <xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.%23ctor>konstruktør.</xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.%23ctor>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext> class.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdiene for en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext>klassen.</xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.IgnorePersistedDecision%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.KeepAlive%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.NoPrompt%2A>|`false`| |<xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.Persist%2A>|`true`| |<xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.PreviousApplicationIdentity%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.UIContext%2A>|<xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerUIContext>|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.IgnorePersistedDecision%2A>| `false`| | <xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.KeepAlive%2A>| `false`| | <xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.NoPrompt%2A>| `false`| | <xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.Persist%2A>| `true`| | <xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.PreviousApplicationIdentity%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.UIContext%2A>| <xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerUIContext>|</xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerUIContext></xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.UIContext%2A></xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.PreviousApplicationIdentity%2A></xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.Persist%2A></xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.NoPrompt%2A></xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.KeepAlive%2A></xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.IgnorePersistedDecision%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext"></xref> class using the specified <xref href="System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerUIContext"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext"> </xref> klasse parametersettet med de angitte <xref href="System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerUIContext"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the properties to the same settings as the default constructor, with the exception of the <xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.UIContext%2A> property, which is set to the value that is passed in.
trans-unit.target: Denne konstruktøren initialiserer egenskapene til de samme innstillingene som Standardkonstruktøren, unntatt <xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.UIContext%2A>egenskapen som er angitt til verdien som er sendt inn</xref:System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerContext.UIContext%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerUIContext"></xref> values that specifies the type of trust manager user interface to use.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerUIContext"> </xref> verdier som angir hvilken type klarering manager brukergrensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the application security manager should ignore any persisted decisions and call the trust manager.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om Programbehandling sikkerhet skal ignorere faste beslutninger og kall klareringen manager.

trans-unit.source: If `true`, the <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationSecurityManager> ignores persisted decisions for the application and calls the trust manager.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `true`, <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationSecurityManager>ignorerer faste avgjørelsene for programmet og kaller klareringen manager.</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationSecurityManager>

trans-unit.source: If `false`, the <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationSecurityManager> uses cached decisions, if available.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `false`, <xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationSecurityManager>bruker bufret avgjørelsene, hvis den er tilgjengelig.</xref:System.Security.Policy.ApplicationSecurityManager>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to call the trust manager; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>kall til klareringen-behandling. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the trust manager should cache state for this application, to facilitate future requests to determine application trust.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om transportbehandling klarering skal bufre tilstand for dette programmet, slik at fremtidige forespørsler for å finne programmet klarering.

trans-unit.source: This flag is set to `true` if the host might call the trust manager numerous times for trust decisions for this application.
trans-unit.target: Dette flagget er satt til `true` Hvis verten kan ringe klareringen manager flere ganger hvis du stoler avgjørelsene for dette programmet.

trans-unit.source: If `true`, the trust manager should cache any state that might improve the speed of future calls to the <xref:System.Security.Policy.IApplicationTrustManager.DetermineApplicationTrust%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `true`, transportbehandling klarering skal bufre en tilstand som kan forbedre hastigheten for fremtidige kall til den <xref:System.Security.Policy.IApplicationTrustManager.DetermineApplicationTrust%2A>metoden.</xref:System.Security.Policy.IApplicationTrustManager.DetermineApplicationTrust%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property is set to `false` if the host does not expect to call the trust manager again for the current <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er satt til `false` Hvis verten ikke forventer å kalle klareringen manager på nytt for gjeldende <xref:System.AppDomain>.</xref:System.AppDomain>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to cache state data; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til hurtigbufferen tilstandsdata. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the trust manager should prompt the user for trust decisions.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om transportbehandling klarering skal Spør brukeren om klarering avgjørelsene.

trans-unit.source: If `false`, the trust manager determines the appropriate user dialog to obtain a trust decision.
trans-unit.target: Hvis `false`, transportbehandling klarering bestemmer dialogboksen riktig bruker for å hente en klarering beslutningstreet.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to not prompt the user; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to prompt the user.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Be ikke bruker; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> slik at brukeren.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user's response to the consent dialog should be persisted.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om brukersvar til dialogboksen samtykke skal beholdes.

trans-unit.source: This property is `true` if the user’s response to the consent dialog should be persisted to avoid further prompting the user with each new activation request.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er `true` hvis brukerens svar på dialogboksen samtykke må være fast for å unngå fremtidige ber brukeren med hver forespørsel om ny aktivering.

trans-unit.source: This property is `false` if the user’s response should not be persisted.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er `false` hvis brukerens svar ikke må fast.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to cache state data; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>til hurtigbufferen tilstandsdata. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the identity of the previous application identity.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir identiteten til den forrige tjenesteprogramidentiteten.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ApplicationIdentity"></xref> object representing the previous <xref href="System.ApplicationIdentity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.ApplicationIdentity"> </xref> -objekt som representerer den forrige <xref href="System.ApplicationIdentity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of user interface the trust manager should display.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir typen brukergrensesnittet transportbehandling klarering skal vises.

trans-unit.source: The UIContext property is intended to recommend the user interface the trust manager should provide for the trust decision.
trans-unit.target: UIContext egenskapen skal anbefaler brukergrensesnittet transportbehandling klarering må angi for klarering beslutningstreet.

trans-unit.source: A trust manager can decide to use a different interface.
trans-unit.target: En kan velge å bruke et annet grensesnitt.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerUIContext"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerUIContext"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerUIContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Security.Policy.TrustManagerUIContext"> </xref>.
